snippet.title: A Bonnie Odyssey - Official Announcement Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2023 Showcase
snippet.description:
Take a tour of the sci-world of A Bonnie Odyssey in this announcement trailer for the upcoming retro-puzzle mystery game. In this open-world sci-fi adventure about the tale of a father and daughter separated by time, you play as Zoe exploring the Scottish wilds and abandoned science facilities, making odd little friends along the way. A Bonnie Odyssey is coming to PC.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
